new_datasets.author: rileykim
new_datasets.description:
Multilingual Image-Text Translation Dataset (MMT)
	


	
		
		Overview
	

This dataset contains Multilingual Multimodal Translation (MMT) pairs from FLORES-200, featuring image-text combinations across 11 languages. The dataset is designed for training and evaluating multimodal translation models that can translate text while considering visual context.

	
		
		MMT (Multilingual Multimodal Translation)
	


Multilingual: 11 languages (en, id, ja, kk, ko, ru, ur, uz, vi, zh-cn, zh-tw)â€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/rileykim/multilingual-image-text-translation.

new_datasets.author: fdemelo
new_datasets.description:
UD CoNLL-U 2017 aligned
	

This dataset is a processed version of the dataset made available for the UD CoNLL Shared Task 2017, entitled "Multilingual Parsing from Raw Text to Universal Dependencies." This task is based on the Universal Dependencies 2.0 dataset.
The processing aligns words and tokens along with their morphological annotations using the universal part-of-speech set for sequence-to-sequence task training. 
The dataset fields are described in the table below:

	
		
Fieldâ€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/fdemelo/ud-conll2017-aligned.

new_datasets.author: anonymous-1501
new_datasets.description:
Open Korean Historical Corpus
	


	
		
		Dataset Description
	

The Open Korean Historical Corpus is a large-scale, openly licensed dataset created to address the lack of accessible data for Korean NLP and historical linguistics.
It contains 17.7 million documents (5.1 billion tokens) compiled from 19 distinct archives, spanning 1,300 years from the 7th century to 2025. The corpus is linguistically diverse, covering Korean (Middle, Early Modern, Modern, North), Classical Chinese, andâ€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/anonymous-1501/Open-Korean-Historical-Corpus.

This dataset contains the AIHub Korean Web Corpus cleaned and morphologically annotated with the word identifier.Each record stores morpheme-level tokens and two subsets: semantic and stylistic.

Field
Type

text
string

new_datasets.description:
ðŸ—£ï¸ xLLMs â€“ Dialogue Pubs
	

xLLMs â€“ Dialogue Pubs is a large-scale multilingual dialogue dataset for training and evaluating conversational LLMs on long-context reasoning, factual grounding, multilingual agility, and tool use.It contains nearly one million synthetic conversations in 9 languages â€” en, vi, ko, es, pt, zh, fr, it, de â€” with many dialogues reaching tens of thousands of tokens (tokenized with "Ghost 8B Beta").
The data were generated via document-guided prompting thatâ€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/lamhieu/xllms_dialogue_pubs.

new_datasets.author: Geonwoohong
new_datasets.description:
Dataset Description
	

This dataset is a morphologically encoded Korean corpus constructed for morph-related research.It integrates eight cleaned Korean sources â€” written, spoken, nonpublication, newspaper, messenger, aspect_emotion, emotion, and dialogue â€”and encodes each sample into structured morpheme sequences for semantic and stylistic streams.
Each sentence was analyzed using Kiwi (Korean Intelligent Word Identifier),split into semantic, stylistic, and combined morphemeâ€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/Geonwoohong/modu-morph-encoded-ko.

new_datasets.author: lcw99
new_datasets.description:
DistilQwen 100k Korean
	

This dataset is a Korean translation of the original alibaba-pai/DistilQwen_100k dataset.

	
		
		Dataset Structure
	

The dataset contains both English and Korean versions of instruction-response pairs:
{
  "instruction": "Original English instruction text",
  "output": "Original English response/answer",
  "instruction_kr": "Korean translation of the instruction",
  "output_kr": "Korean translation of the response/answer",
  "_dataset_index": 30000
}

Eachâ€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/lcw99/DistilQwen_100k_korean.

new_datasets.author: lamhieu
new_datasets.description:
ðŸ‘‹ xLLMs â€“ Dialogue Grettings
	

xLLMs â€“ Dialogue Grettings is a multilingual greeting & small-talk dataset for building assistants that recognize salutations, respond politely, elicit intent, and pivot from chit-chat to helpful task support.It spans 41,320 dialogues across 16 languages (en, vi, ko, es, pt, zh, fr, it, de, ja, ru, pl, nl, hi, tr, id). Each sample is a short, natural exchange that begins with a greeting and evolves into a light informational micro-task.

This datasetâ€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/lamhieu/xllms_dialogue_greetings.

korean-medical-dispute-cases
	


	
		
		Dataset Description
	

This dataset aims to provide a comprehensive overview of various medical dispute cases in Korea, focusing on mediation outcomes and case details. It features well-structured data, including clear definitions for each field, covering a range of medical disputes with rich details that facilitate analysis and research. The dataset has been improved by simplifying and standardizing longer text fields, increasing the diversityâ€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/Mobiusi/korean-medical-dispute-cases.

new_datasets.author: junkim100
new_datasets.description:
KITE: Korean Instruction-following Task Evaluation
	






	
		
	
	
		Dataset Description
	

KITE (Korean Instruction-following Task Evaluation) is the first comprehensive benchmark specifically designed to evaluate the Korean instruction-following capabilities of Large Language Models (LLMs). Unlike existing Korean benchmarks that focus mainly on factual knowledge or multiple-choice testing, KITE directly targets diverse, open-ended instruction-following tasks.
	
		
		Dataset Summaryâ€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/junkim100/KITE.

new_datasets.author: taery
new_datasets.description:
collatz_conjecture_100m
	

Hello, this is the collatz conjecture dataset.
The Collatz Conjecture

n is even number, Divide by 2.
n is odd number, multiply by 3 and add 1.
repeat, See if it goes to 1.
Does it apply to all natural numbers?

This concise problem has not yet been proven.
This problem is also famous for its beautiful graphs.
The dataset contains the paths from 1 to 100 million natural numbers leading to 1.
The path where a single digit in a row becomes 1 is displayedâ€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/taery/Collatz_conjecture_100m.

		Dataset Summary
	

Ko-GSM8K is a Korean adaptation of the GSM8K dataset, which is composed of high-quality grade school-level math word problems. 
Each problem requires multi-step reasoning involving basic arithmetic operations.

removed_datasets.author: thunder-research-group
removed_datasets.description:
Dataset Card for SNU Thunder-DeID Entity Mention List
	


	
		
		Dataset Summary
	

SNU Thunder-DeID Entity Mention List is an auxiliary dataset created to be used together with SNU Thunder-DeID annotated court judgments.It provides manually constructed entity mention lists for each entity type (label) used in NER-based de-identification of Korean court judgments.
The dataset is designed to support data augmentation and entity replacement tasks during training of NER models.It is notâ€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/thunder-research-group/SNU_Thunder-DeID-entity_mention_list.

removed_datasets.author: thunder-research-group
removed_datasets.description:
Dataset Card for SNU Thunder-DeID Annotated Court Judgments
	


	
		
		Dataset Summary
	

SNU Thunder-DeID Annotated Court Judgments is a dataset constructed for Named Entity Recognition (NER)-based de-identification of Korean court judgments. 
The dataset consists of annotated court judgments across multiple criminal case types, aiming to support research and development of NER models for Korean court judgments. 
It includes sentence-level annotated data from three representativeâ€¦ See the full description on the dataset page: https://huggingface.co/datasets/thunder-research-group/SNU_Thunder-DeID-annotated_court_judgments.
